job_details.Functieomschrijving:
To achieve this mission, we are looking for a Senior Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer to join our Generative AI team.
            What you will do
            Are you ready to push the boundaries of AI? As a pivotal player in our Generative AI team, you'll design and implement cutting-edge solutions on our centralized AI platform, empowering CM.com's customers to manage and control AI-driven assistants. Our Generative AI team focusses on providing functionality and control around Large Language Models in combination with traditional NLP concepts to fully service our customers' use-cases.
            As a Senior Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer, you will innovate by designing and developing state-of-the-art machine learning models and algorithms, including LLMs, classification, and clustering techniques using familiar frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn. Leading the way, you will mentor junior colleagues, nurturing talent and sharing expertise in a collaborative environment. Collaboration is key as you work closely with the team to build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio.
            Currently, our product consists of a custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents across multiple domains (customer service, marketing, internal automation…). Part of your job will be to optimize the engine's performance and efficiency, all while staying informed of industry advancements to ensure our solutions remain at the forefront of technology. Additionally, you will contribute to shaping the technical vision and strategic roadmap of our Generative AI initiatives, driving the future of intelligent customer interactions.
job_details.full_text:
Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer

To achieve this mission, we are looking for a Senior Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer to join our Generative AI team.
            What you will do
            Are you ready to push the boundaries of AI? As a pivotal player in our Generative AI team, you'll design and implement cutting-edge solutions on our centralized AI platform, empowering CM.com's customers to manage and control AI-driven assistants. Our Generative AI team focusses on providing functionality and control around Large Language Models in combination with traditional NLP concepts to fully service our customers' use-cases.
            As a Senior Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer, you will innovate by designing and developing state-of-the-art machine learning models and algorithms, including LLMs, classification, and clustering techniques using familiar frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn. Leading the way, you will mentor junior colleagues, nurturing talent and sharing expertise in a collaborative environment. Collaboration is key as you work closely with the team to build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio.
            Currently, our product consists of a custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents across multiple domains (customer service, marketing, internal automation…). Part of your job will be to optimize the engine's performance and efficiency, all while staying informed of industry advancements to ensure our solutions remain at the forefront of technology. Additionally, you will contribute to shaping the technical vision and strategic roadmap of our Generative AI initiatives, driving the future of intelligent customer interactions.

profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes Generative AI, LLMs, and building AI-driven assistants, aligning with the core definition of a GenAI Engineer. While ML concepts are present, the focus on LLMs, RAG (implied by 'autonomous AI agents' and 'customizable'), and building user-facing applications points towards GenAI specialization.

phrases: design and implement cutting-edge solutions on our centralized AI platform
designing and developing state-of-the-art machine learning models and algorithms
including LLMs, classification, and clustering techniques
optimize the engine's performance and efficiency
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the creation, development, and optimization of machine learning models, including specific mention of LLMs and traditional ML techniques.

phrases: empowering CM.com's customers to manage and control AI-driven assistants
build innovative products that are either customer-facing or integrated across the broader CM.com platform and product portfolio
custom-built inference engine that's able to process any question/instruction from the end-user providing fully customizable, autonomous AI agents
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the development of user-facing products and systems, including AI-driven assistants and inference engines, which are core to software development in this context.

phrases: optimize the engine's performance and efficiency
staying informed of industry advancements to ensure our solutions remain at the forefront of technology
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing engine performance and ensuring solutions remain at the forefront of technology imply ongoing maintenance, monitoring, and improvement of deployed AI systems, which falls under Operations Engineering.
These phrases indicate an understanding of customer needs and various business domains where AI solutions are applied.
This phrase refers to established techniques within the field of Natural Language Processing, which are often integrated into broader modeling efforts.

soft_skills.phrase: innovate by designing and developing state-of-the-art machine learning models and algorithms
shaping the technical vision and strategic roadmap
optimize the engine's performance and efficiency
mentor junior colleagues, nurturing talent and sharing expertise
